Package entrants.BT.Execution.Actions

Class Chase

  • java.lang.Object
    • jbt.execution.core.ExecutionTask
      • jbt.execution.task.leaf.ExecutionLeaf
        • jbt.execution.task.leaf.action.ExecutionAction
          • entrants.BT.Execution.Actions.Chase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jbt.execution.core.event.ITaskListener
    public class Chase
extends jbt.execution.task.leaf.action.ExecutionAction
    ExecutionAction class created from MMPM action Chase. Offers 6 Chase strategies available as public constants
    • TO_CLOSEST_CIRCLING_NODE
    • TO_CIRCLING_NODE_IM_CLOSEST_TO
    • TO_PACMAN
    • TO_CLOSEST_POSSIBLE_PACMAN_NEXT_DESTINATION
    • ACCORDING_TO_AGENT
    • CHOOSE_RANDOM_STRATEGY
    The used strategy can be set by the method setChasingStrategy(int). For more details on how the different strategies work, refer to the project report.

      • setChasingStrategy

        public static void setChasingStrategy​(int chasingStrategy)
        This method sets the chasing strategy that will be used by the ghosts.
        Parameters:
        chasingStrategy - A value representing the strategy to use. the constants are available in the Chase class
